 2013-12512013-11-21,  ,  ,  HRSDC,  LAB,  ,  , 
ActFair Wages and Hours of Labour Act
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Fair Wages and Hours of Labour Regulations
PrecisRegulations Repealing THE FAIR WAGES AND HOURS OF LABOUR REGULATIONS in order to avoid confusion about the wage requirements that apply to Government construction contracts given that the Fair Wages and Hours of Labour Act is being repealed.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0204 Publication Date: 2013-12-04
